Text:
wma format :-(
But at least it does play with my xmms software player , so I guess there is no DigitalRestrictionManagement in these files at least. 

To the author: I recommend mp3, can be played by much more software and hardware players!

@zilozero- easy fix for that one. There's shareware called Switch, which is an audio converter that can do batch conversions between almost any formats. I tried it out on this and it worked just fine. I'd recommend it.
